title: Tamil Nadu CM MK Stalin signs MoUs for Rs 850 crores with Lincoln Electric, Vishay Precision, Visteon
description: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin announced that the state has secured MoUs worth Rs 850 crores with US-based companies Lincoln Electric, Vishay Precision, and Visteon. Additionally, a Rs 2000 crore MoU was signed with Trilliant for a manufacturing unit and support centre. Further agreements were made with Nike, Optum, Eaton, and Assurant.
